title: Drawing, "Alternative Lamp Designs, for Artemide", 1998
medium: Rollerball pen in black ink and felt-tip pen in black ink on two joined sheets of white paper
signed: Signed and dated in rollerball pen and black ink, WHERE?:  Rashid./Feb. 6/98-/Paris [underlined]
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, right side: "Abstract of lamp shade/Rashid/ Feb.6/98./ Paris" and along right side: "Classicon"
description: Left-hand sheet:  two designs for "Garbo" variant shape lamp; one an elevation showing the placement of the light bulb and the upper half intended to be executed in an unspecified material with a frosted finish and the lower half in a clear finish; the other a perspective view to be executed in stainless steel and the body in plastic.  On the right-hand sheet are five lamp profiles in different forms of the "mushroom" shape.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Alternative Lamp Designs, for Artemide", 1998. Rollerball pen in black ink and felt-tip pen in black ink on two joined sheets of white paper. Gift of Karim Rashid. 2000-50-2.
